issue.title: [Java] Remove useless class ByteArrayWrapper
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6249](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6249). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This class was introduced into encoding part to compare byte[] values equals.

Since now we compare value/vector equals by new added visitor API by ARROW-6022 instead of  comparing `getObject`, this class is no use anymore.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6249?focusedCommentId=16908633) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5093
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5093>
